<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_task">stateCHANGESTO3^EQ<item display_value="Closed Complete" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>E-Voucher Request task Completion valida</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    approval.addEncodedQuery('sysapproval='+current.request_item+'^state=requested');
    approval.query();
	gs.addInfoMessage(approval.getRowCount());
    if (approval.next()) {
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-12 13:45:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8248eaf52f1882105ba5b8e72799b68e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>E-Voucher Request task Completion valida</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Corporate Gifting" source="x_906853_corpora_0">a40c72102fe731105ba5b8e72799b626</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Gifting">a40c72102fe731105ba5b8e72799b626</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8248eaf52f1882105ba5b8e72799b68e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-12 13:58:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8248eaf52f1882105ba5b8e72799b68e"/></record_update>
